title: Aleem congratulates Arshad Nadeem on winning Gold Medal
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP):Federal Minister for Communications & President Istehkam-e-Pakistan Party, Abdul Aleem Khan, has extended heartfelt congratulations to Arshad Nadeem on winning the Gold Medal, stating that Alhamdulillah, once again all the Pakistanis hats off and have much pride on this success.
In his congratulatory message posted on X, Abdul Aleem Khan said that youngsters like Arshad Nadeem are a source who serve as role models and earn good name for the nation. He pointed out that the Asian Athletics Championship held in South Korea has brought great honor to Pakistan and defeating an Indian athlete in the competition has made the victory even more special for the country.
Federal Minister added that Arshad Nadeem, a true son of a resilient nation, clinched the Gold Medal with the help of Almighty Allah. He emphasized that unwavering determination; skill and strong commitment are the foundation of the Champions.
In his message, Abdul Aleem Khan further stated, “Well done to our young athletes! The entire nation is proud of you.”
